title: Yakut - Mark (Print)
description: Yakut, also known as Yakutian, Sakha, Saqa or Saxa (Yakut: саха тыла), is a Turkic language spoken by around 450,000 native speakers, primarily the ethnic Yakuts and one of the official languages of Sakha (Yakutia), a federal republic in the Russian Federation.

language.name: Yakut
language.area: Sakha, near Arctic Ocean, the length of middle Lena River, Aldan and Kolyma rivers, 3220 km.
